Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/83rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, Holland, 87th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, Holland, 87th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/83rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Reroute at Northwest Highway/Nettleton
ShortDescription: 68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Northwest Highway, Nagle, Devon and Northwest Highway near Northwest Highway/Nettleton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Northwest Highway, Nagle, Devon and Northwest Highway, due to street blockage near Northwest Highway/Nettleton.

Allow extra travel time.
